Episodes.Title: Under Pressure
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: On one of the hottest days of the year, the first responders feel the pressure with harrowing incidents.

Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: When a massive earthquake rocks Los Angeles, the responders rush to rescue victims in a crumbling high-rise hotel.

Episodes.Title: Help Is Not Coming
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: The first responders continue to deal with the fallout of a massive earthquake and its deadly aftershocks.

Episodes.Title: Stuck
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: The first responders race to rescue victims trapped in various tight spots; Athena contemplates accepting a promotion.

Episodes.Title: Awful People
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: Maddie goes on a ride-along with Athena, while dealing with a seemingly "perfect" dispatcher; Hen must figure out how to save her family.

Episodes.Title: Dosed
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: The first responders race to the rescue of a crashed news copter, and emergencies at an eating contest, a bodybuilding competition and a toddler pageant.

Episodes.Title: Haunted
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: Halloween finds the first responders racing to a cemetery rescue, a haunted hayride and a spooky Hollywood parade; Maddie thinks she's received a "ghost" call from a missing hiker.

Episodes.Title: Buck, Actually
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: Buck jumps back into the dating scene; A woman going to great extremes to get her husband's attention; A newlywed couple are involved in a car accident.

Episodes.Title: Hen Begins
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: Hen recalls the first times she met Chimney and Athena, reliving her evolution into the firefighter she is today.

Episodes.Title: Merry Ex-Mas
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: The first responders deal with a man trapped in a present, a mistletoe stunt gone awry and a Christmas-light showdown; Bobby contemplates his future with Athena.

Episodes.Title: New Beginnings
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: Bobby meets Athena's parents; Doug insinuates himself deeper into Chimney's life; Athena looks into a distressing 911 call.

Episodes.Title: Chimney Begins
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: Chimney relives his evolution as a firefighter, looking back at how he joined Station 118 and became the firefighter and paramedic he is today.

Episodes.Title: Fight or Flight
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: The first responders rally together to search for a missing Maddie.

Episodes.Title: Broken
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: The call center must turn to old school tactics after being hit with a massive system-wide power outage; The first responders deal with explosions in multiple homes and a difficult child birth.

Episodes.Title: Ocean's 9-1-1
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: A going-away party for a bank manager turns into an emergency, and then a mystery, as the first responders are accused of pulling off a daring heist.

Episodes.Title: Bobby Begins Again
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: After his devastating family tragedy in Minnesota, Bobby moves to LA, where he becomes Captain of the 118, and meets Athena for the first time.

Episodes.Title: This Life We Choose
Episodes.Writer: Ryan Murphy, Brad Falchuk, Tim Minear
Episodes.Actors: Angela Bassett, Peter Krause, Jennifer Love Hewitt
Episodes.Plot: The first responders suspect a serial bomber is on the loose after two mail bombs go off; Buck faces a life or death situation.
